1 tick = 0.031 ms
SONY remote
36kHz

L 0x360 = 864 = 26.3 ms         Pauza mezi vysilanim
H 0x50  = 80  = 2.44 ms         Start bit
L 0x12  = 18  = 0.55 ms         "0"         
H 0x28  = 40  = 1.22 ms         "1"
